page.title: 09SALISBURY SHOPS
page.content: The most popular public building in Salisbury is the 10 year old divisional library. It has over 18000 books. Pinders hardware shop is also very popular with 700 customers a day. The most popular stores are Tesco and Safeways for groceries, Woolworth's for general goods and Marks & Spencer's for fashions. There are 13 fashion shops in the Old George Mall. Their prices range from 65p to Â£100. Most clothes, from sporty socks to the latest fashions are reasonably priced. The main shopping area is situated around the Central Market square, with the Law Courts of the Guildhall in one corner. Salisbury has numerous shoe shops and a great number of Building Society Offices!!
